summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new StoryForge features including drag-and-drop, batch operations, Notion sync, AI image description, and inline editing. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend features mostly functional with excellent UI/UX implementation.

ui_bugs.issue: Shot detail dialog does not always open when clicking on shot cards
ui_bugs.notes: May be timing issue or click target needs adjustment

passed_tests: Backend: Shot reorder API (POST /api/projects/{id}/shots/reorder) working correctly
Backend: Batch compile API (POST /api/projects/{id}/batch-compile) successfully compiling 2/2 shots
Backend: Notion push API (POST /api/projects/{id}/notion/push) returning 15 rows with proper schema
Backend: AI describe image API (POST /api/projects/{id}/describe-image) working with GPT-5.2
Frontend: Drag handles (grip icons) present on all 15 shot cards
Frontend: Select mode toggle working - shows/hides checkboxes correctly
Frontend: Batch Compile button appears when shots selected, shows correct count
Frontend: Push to Notion button present and accessible
Frontend: World cards have inline editing capability - click to edit working
Frontend: Add World dialog contains AI Describe from Image button
Frontend: Character cards have inline editing functionality
Frontend: Add Character dialog contains AI Describe from Image button
Frontend: New Project page renders complete form with validation
Backend: All 17 API tests passing (100% success rate)
Frontend: Navigation between tabs (World Bible, Storyboard, Characters) working smoothly
Frontend: Form validation working on New Project page
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Shot detail dialog click handling may need adjustment to ensure reliable opening when clicking shot cards
